dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 5446 IH: No Tariffs on Groceries Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Stevens introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To limit the authority to impose duties on articles of food.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the No Tariffs on Groceries Act.

section.header: Limitation on authority to impose duties on articles of food

subsection.text: The President may not impose duties proposed by the Presidential Administration on articles of food unless—

paragraph.text: the President transmits to Congress a request to impose such duties; and
such request is subsequently and specifically approved by an Act of Congress.

subsection.text: The limitation in subsection (a) shall not apply with respect to existing tariff-rate quotas on articles of food.
In this section, the term articles of food means—

paragraph.text: articles used for food or drink for man or other animals;
articles used for components of any articles described in paragraph (1); and
